column3: Department of Food and Nutritional Sciences
column5: Apply for this programmeLearn the science behind providing safe food to the public with our MSc Food Technology - Quality Assurance degree.On this course, you’ll work with expert academics from the Department of Food and Nutritional Sciences as you:learn to apply and maintain advanced food quality assurance systems that meet both UK and international expectationsunderstand the chemical, biological and physical principles involved in food processing and storagelearn about quality and legal requirements in food provision.As part of your studies, you will work in some of the UK’s largest dedicated food teaching facilities. These include:
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
